Text: First hardtied I tried, this one's quite good!

This may sound really bizarre, but I met this girl in a shop today. I swear to God! I asked if her name was jenny, saying that she reminded me of someone, and she seemed a little shocked, then said no, and gave me another name. She looked at me several times afterwards too, and she had the exact same funny little drawl and way of raising her eyebrows. Ha ha! Life is strange!
